actions.text: Amendment SA 2983 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 137.

Amendment SA 2983 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4325; text: CR S4325) To increase employment for members of the Armed Forces in emerging industries.
